snippet.title: Mega Drive Longplay [132] Phantasy Star II (Part 1 of 8)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Valis77

This is my very first Rpg on the sega genesis. The Story, Graphics, Music, Characters and overall gameplay is so bright and colorful and fun to play. By far it's a cult classic and one of the greatest rpgs of all time. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
